SAMI Patching Checklist
Patch: 18-14-t1

X0. Project discussion
  0.1. Which changes will be included
	    Issues included
	    21-155, 21-156 (21-126), 21-158 (21-120), 21-157, 21-161, 21-159
	    
  0.2. Timeline: Goal is 8/27/21 release

X 1. Project set up
 X 1.1. git pull
 X 1.2. prepare checklist
 X 1.3. prepare recipe doc
 X 1.4. prepare text doc
 X 1.5. prepare webpage template
 X 1.6. git pull/push
 X 1.7. add updated routines to BBEdit project
      Routine list
       SAMIUR
       SAMIUR2
      
 X 1.8. add log routine to BBEdit project
       SAMIURUL

 X 1.13. Regrettable Bodge

X 2. Update routines
 X 2.1. bump version & dates
 X 2.2. update change log routine (SAMIURUL)
 X 2.3. update dashboard (sami pax)
 X 2.4. update any scripts with correct path
 X 2.5. update webpage
 X 2.6. push to repo

  3. Run XINDEX and ARJT
 X 3.1. load in vapalsyotta lib/silver/a-sami-vapals-elcap--vo-osehra-github/, 
 X 3.2. copy routines to ~/run/routine directory
 X 3.3. run XINDEX
 X 3.4. fix any bugs,
 X 3.5. use ARJT tools recipe^ARJTXRW (see Introduction to ARJT tools)
 X 3.6. update dashboard 
 X 3.7. update recipe 
 X 3.8. git pull/push
 
X 4. Descriptions
 X 4.1. convert to new short version ids, update dates & times in each routine 
   or routine log 
   git log --format='%h %ad %an | %s' --date="format:%Y-%m-%d" routines/<routine>.m
  nope 4.2. add ids to issues listed in description
  X 4.3. add to description issues newly resolved in final version
    4.4. update checksums in description (which description?)
    4.5. update install instructions
 
X 5. KIDS Build
X 5.1. Create KIDS build (XPD MAIN Menu)
X  5.2. export to out dock, (Transport distribution)
X  5.3. push to repo,
X  5.5. push recipe to repo,
X  5.6. pull to out dock


X 7. Create Zip package
X  7.1. copy form-fields directory to out dock
X  7.2. copy www directory to out dock
X  7.4. use zip to create archive package (makezip)
X  7.5. push archive package to repo
X  7.6. push archive package to website
X  7.7. update version website's link

X 8. Test Install
 X 8.1. install on vapalsyotta (& revise if necessary),
 X 8.2. test changes on vapalsyotta
 X 8.3. update dashboard
 X 8.4. install on vapalscache (& revise if necessary),
 X 8.5. test changes on vapalscache
 X 8.6. update dashboard
 X 8.7. Skype team and ask them to test

9. Release Patch
 X 9.1. Email interested parties
 X 9.2. Update VAPALS Bugs and Requested Features spreadsheet
  9.3. File any returned captures
  9.4. Update dashboard
